    • Constructor Detail

      • Network

        public Network​(int[] NETWORK_LAYER_SIZES,
               boolean train)
        Constructor for the full network
        Parameters:
        NETWORK_LAYER_SIZES - Takes an array whose length is the number of layers and whose indeces contain the number of perceptrons in each layer
        train - True if training the network, false if network is performing

    • Method Detail

      • compute_cost

        public void compute_cost​(double[] outputs,
                         double[] expected)
        A function that associates a cost with the guesses of the network. For training use.
        Parameters:
        outputs - An array of double values that are the result of the computation.
        expected - A double value of the expected results

      • compute

        public void compute​(double[] input,
                    double[] expected)
        A function that computes on the given data and feeds the outputs into a cost function
        Parameters:
        input - A double value given for the first layer of the network
        expected - An array of double values. It should have the same length as the output layer and the expected index should have a value of 1.00 while all others should have a value of 0.00

      • train_network

        public void train_network​(double[] outputs,
                          double[] expected)
        A function to train the network using supervised learning
        Parameters:
        outputs - The outputs of the final layer of perceptrons
        expected - The outputs that we want the network to give

      • print_output

        public void print_output()
        A function that prints the result of the network.

        public double get_avg_cost()

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
